data.text: Halli Jisu'n inmani diang aleitipi, “Kei'n kadik-ah natipi kate, Pathian Rengram kha ranak le inruoiya akajuokha inmumakleiseng hiwahin mi lekkhat akathimaksik inom.”
Niruk thengli, Jisu'n Peter, James khat-um John aruoiya inmani ngaikha muol insaangtiang inleisi, inmanibit inleiom, inmani'n inlei-en phakhan Jisu meelsuo alei-inthuul.
Halli ama puondiar kachek kha manmasituol puonkasoop mi ngai'n minchek matormak sik katungnga aleichek.
Khale inruoiya asiamruoi inthum ngai'n Moses li Elijah in Jisu le chong inleirilkha inleimu.

Peter in akheek-ah Jisu diang aleiti, “Karu, angtuk kathame keini'n hiwa munna kinomhi! Keini'n hiwa munhin maichaam inn inthum kinsaksik eii, nang nasik inkhat, Moses sik inkhat, halli Elijah sik inkhat.” Maichaam inteii
Ama'n rilsik leijetmak jarra, Peter khat-um aleiilaak ngai'n inleingak.
Khale inruoiya suumphai aheiwa-ah inmani ngaikha aleimakhu, halli suumphai makheiya rasa ajuonei, “Hiwahi kei iminriangkhet kasapa eii ama iti rangairu!”
Inmani'n innot theiya insir inpangkha inlei-en phakhan inmani'n Jisu eleiya tuteii leimumu.
Amuol makheiya injuochum phakhan, Jisu'n inmani diang chong aleipeii, “Ning imu ngaihi nangni'n tu miring diang-um rilpimaru, Miring Sapa kha kathi makheiya ahongringnook maklaiseng.”
Inmani'n ama chongpe kha inleijui, inmani'n hiwa jarra khatli inkhat diang inlei-inkel, “Akathi makheiya ringnooksik tihi ang tiname?”
Halli inmani'n Jisu diang inleirakel, “Angjarra Dan kamajia Karu ngai'n Elijah eii kajuo masasik intime?” Mal 4:5; Matt 11:4

Halli “Ama'n inmani diang aleimasang, Elijah kha eii angrakip kaminsuuk sik-ah akajuo masasik, halle angjarra Pathian chong inthiang khan Miring Sapa kha poongna angjet adeisik eii khat-um mi ngai'n zootnunu itime?
Kei'n nangni diang kanati, Elijah chu aleijuo suojei, khale inruoiya chong inthiang in ama jarra ileiti angnga, mi ngai'n ama chungnga inthozootkha inthosuojei.”
Inmani'n asiamruoi leiilaak ngaidiang injuopha khan, inmani'n mipui katamtak inkoolla khat-um Dan Karu ngai'n inmanile murruolsiak inleitho kha injuomu.
Mipui'n Jisu kha inleimu phakhan inmani'n inleingak, halli inmani'n inheitaanna Jisu kha chubei inleitho.
Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang aleirakel, “Angjarra nangni'n inmanile murruolsiak ningthome?”
Mipui ngai karra miring inkhat in ahongmasang, “Karu, kasapa suungnga ratha kathamak om halli chong asuokmak jarra kei'n nangdiang kaheiruoi.

Ratha kathamak in ama kha asur racham, ama'n nepilla inluoiya abaiya achilphuon aleisuok, aha aleikarial, khat-um apum kha leikeichangkhang, khawa khan ajar eya kei'n nasiamruoi ngaidiang napuutsuok pinasik kaleiti, takkha inmani'n leimatormu.”
Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, “Eh ngamna kaneimak nangni ngai! Nangnile angtuk kasoot kei'n kalaom suomsikme? Kei'n nangni kha angtuk kasoot kanaladeipui sikme? naipangpa kha keidiang heiruoiru!”
Inmani'n ama kha Jisu diang inheiruoi.
“Angtuk kasoot mejei hin tinahi?” Jisu'n apadiang aleirakel.
“Apha angjet akathamak ratha'n amahi thatnasik-ah mei khat-um tuiya ideengluut ejei. Nang in namator inchu, keihi naminriangro khat-um nasanro!”
Jisu'n ama diang aleiti, “Ingamna kanei ama diangchu! ang rakip ethei eii.”
Khawapha takkhan apa'n ahongkheek-ah aheiti, “Kei ngamna kanei, kei ngamna kasuolhi nasanro!”

Jisu'n mipuikha inmani omnatiang inheinai amupha khan, ratha kathamak diang chong aleipeii, “Kuorseet khat-um chong kasoukmak ratha,” Jisu'n aleiti, “Naipangpa makheiya nang in heisuok inlang halli inlet-ah luutnook khaimaro.”
Ratha khan akheek-ah, naipangpa kha keichang khangnga natheiya juodeengjuonna halli aheisuokjei, naipangpa kha akathi alei-ang, halli mi rakip in inleiti, “ama hi athijei!”
Takkha Jisu'n naipangpa kha akutkhan amahuumma aleikeithei, halli ama'n ahongngir.
Jisu'n innsuung aleiluut phakhan, ama siamruoi ngai'n ruuk-ah inleirakel, “Angjarra keini'n ratha kathamak kha kinpuutsuok matormakme?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Pathian kani elekleiya hiwa ngaihi puutsuok matornutun.”
Jisu khat-um ama siamruoi ngai'n khawa munkha inleimathaan, Galilee suungtiang inleisi phakhan, Jisu'n tudiang-um ama sina leiminjet zootmak,
ajarchu ama siamruoi ngaikha aleiminchu: “Miring Sapa kha mi ngai kutchungnga pe-inta inthatsik eii halli nithum huuini khan ahongringnook sik.”
Takkha inmani'n hiwa minchu nahi leijet matormu, khale inruoiya inmani'n amadiang karakel sik inleichi.
Inmani'n Capernaum tiang inheiwa-ah, innsuung inluut phakhan Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang aleirakel, “Angjarrame nangni'n lamma murruolsiak ningthokha?”
Takkha inmani'n leimasangmu, ajarchu inmani'n lamma murruolsiak inleitho khachu tume akalokkhet tijarra eii.

Jisu'n alei in-ongnga asiamruoi soomleini ngaikha aleikoi, halli inmani diang aleitipi, “Atu ka-ang in chung kanungkhet ezoot inchu ama kha nuoi kanungkhet esik eii, halli mirakip nuoiya kasiinkhet suok a-esik eii.” Matt 20:26,27; 23:11; Mk 10:43,44; Luk 22:26
Ama'n naipang inkhat aheiruoiya inmani ngai maikuungnga aleiminngir, ama'n akakuoa inmani ngaidiang aleitipi,

“Tu ka-ang mi inkhat in hiwa naipang ngai inkhattak kei karamingnga karalaang kha kei innaralaang eii halli kei kanaralaang mikha keibit kanaralaang emak takkha kei kanajuotirpa kha-um inralaang kha eii.”
John in amadiang aleitipi, “Karu, keini'n mi inkhat nang naramingnga raikhuo ipuutsuok kinmu, halli keini'n ama kha kinleikhaap, ajarchu ama kha eini karra mi lei-emak.”
Jisu'n inmanidiang aleitipi, “Ama kha khaapmaru,” “Ajarchu atu ka-ang in chuon inlak kei ramingnga kathomator mikhan innottheiya keihi kathamak-ah narilsenuni.
Atu ka-ang in einile inhalmak mikha eini mi in-eii. Matt 12:30; Luk 11:23
Ajarchu nangkha Christa mi na-eii tia, atu ka-ang in tuirabing inkhat kei karamingnga insik-ah anape inchu, kei'n inthiangnga nangni diang kanati, ama chountho mankha mangnuni.” Matt 10:42
“Atu ka-ang in naipang ngai inkhat kei kadiang ingamna kaminmang ama khachu, ariingnga lungchakari inkhitli tuipui inthuup ah indeengluut kha athadoom.

Khale inruoiya nang nakut in manu anamintho inchu nakut kha tanro! Kut inni huuiya hektik kaboi meikhurra kaluutsik neek-ah, kut khatbeiya hektik kaboi ringkhuo Pathian Rengram kaluutkha athadom. Matt 5:30
Inmani ka-ei ralung ngaikha supthi thinunu khat-um inmani kakaang mei kha supthi thinuni.
Khale inruoiya nang nakeii-in ingamna aminmang inchu, tanro! keii inni huuiya meikhur kaluutsik nekchu keii inchelleiya ringna kaluutkha athadoom,
Khawa khan inmani ka-ei ralung ngaikha supthi thinunu khat-um inmani kakaang mei kha supthi thinuni.
Halli nang namit-in ingamna kha aminmang inchu, kelsuokro! mit inni eya meikhur kaluutsik neek achu mit inkhat bit-ah Pathian Rengram kaluutkha athadoom. Matt 5:29
Khawa khan inmani ka-ei ralung ngaikha supthi thinunu, khat-um inmani kakaang mei kha supthi thinuni. Isa 66:24
Dooiphur kha machiya inminthiang angnga mi rakip-um meiya aminthiangsik eii.
Machi hi a-al; takkha i-alkha amang inchu, angtho tholia woikhat min-al mator minname?
